titleStmt.title: SII 7.854: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 854. (A.R. No. 227 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kopparakecaripaṟmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīAtirrājentradevaṟku yāṇṭu
2Āvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Oymānāṭṭu muññūṟāṉa paṇṭitacoḻa
ccarupetimaṅkalattu kuṭippaḷḷi ceṅkeṇi cātta nālāyiravaṉāṉa karikālacoḻac ceṅkeṇināṭāḻvā
ṉukku kiṭkkaināṭṭu kiṭaṅkilāṉa mummuṭicoḻanallūr Ūrom viṟṟukkuṭutta Ālappākkam kiḻpāṟkel
lai Āṟṟur Ellaikku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai mārinallūr Ellaikku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai kā
virippākkattu vaṭakkunokkip poṉa Oḻuṅkai kālukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai vāṇiyanpūṇṭi E
llaikku teṟkum Innāṟpeṟellaikku Uḷḷum Akappaṭṭa ṉirnilamum kollainilamum Akappaṭa Ivvūrt ti
rukkauriśvaramuṭaiya mahādevar koyilil nān Eḻun=ta ruḷuvitta Āṭiyaruḷuvār cittirameḻiviṭaṅkarkku san=ti Onṟu
kku tiruamutuarici Aṟunāḻikku nellu kuṟuṇi Eḻunāḻiyum kaṟiamutu neyyamutu tayir Amutukku nellu nānā
ḻiyum Āka nāḷ 1kku nellu patakku munnāḻiyum cantrādittavaṟ cellakkaṭavatāka Ivan cātta nālāyiravanāṉa karikālacoḻa
c ceṅkeṇināṭāḻvānpakkal nāṅkaḷ viṟṟu vilai yaṟakkoṇṭu Iṟaiiḻiccik kuṭuttom mummuṭicoḻanallūr
Ūrom Itu paḻaṅkalveṭṭu copāṉattil paṭieṭuttu veṭṭittu Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.854 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
